snippet.title: StellarRoads demo v0.3 - Tandy version (DOS Game)
snippet.description:
This is the Tandy video version of StellarRoad, a 2D scrolling platformer for DOS where you can only go forward and survive by skillfully controlling the vessel's speed and jumping right on time!

Heavily influenced by the well known 1993 classic SkyRoads by Bluemoon, StellarRoads can be seen as a sort of 2D "demake" of SkyRoads.

The game may be downloaded here: https://raphnet.itch.io/stellar-roads
